definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: You can even directly access your address book with the Choose button.
sentences.chinese: 您甚至可以用选取按钮来直接存取您的通讯录。

sentences.english: NO15, Let me write your contact information down in my address book.
sentences.chinese: 让我把你的连络资料记在通讯录里。

sentences.english: Unable to open the addressbook databases on the handheld.
sentences.chinese: 无法开启手持装置上的通讯录资料库。

sentences.english: As a user of the Fong & Yeung Studio mailing list, you understand that emails may be periodically sent to your account.
sentences.chinese: 杨方创作室会使用此通讯录发送电邮到你的邮箱。

sentences.english: If there is any way you can send me my address book, I would be willing to pay for it.
sentences.chinese: 要是你肯把邮箱通讯录还给我，我愿意酬谢你。

sentences.english: However, not all directories will give you good results.
sentences.chinese: 不过，并非所有的通讯录会给你良好效果。

sentences.english: The man who stole my wallet took my address book as well.
sentences.chinese: 偷走我钱包的那个人把我的通讯录也拿走了。

sentences.english: Determines whether to lookup the sender email in address book.
sentences.chinese: 决定是否在通讯录中寻找寄件者电子邮件帐号。

sentences.english: Then I design categories for tasks and contact-activities.
sentences.chinese: 我会根据任务类别设定通讯录有关的活动。

sentences.english: Other addtional function are browsing website and contacts.
sentences.chinese: 其他的附加功能有浏览网页功能和通讯录功能。

sentences.english: Sync your contacts and calenders directly to your phone.
sentences.chinese: 同步通讯录和压延直接向您的手机。
找不到可写的通讯录资源。

definition: to send to multiple recipients/mass mailout/to occur in a clustered fashion
Weixin or WeChat (mobile text and voice messaging service developed by Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4])
Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])
to add sb to one's blacklist (on a cellphone, or in instant messaging software etc)/abbr. for 拉到黑名單|拉到黑名单
to turn off (a machine or device)/to finish shooting a film
